message.body: ###### gym on a Sunday morning: deader than dead

Also: want to go with me to see ############ at the TLA on Tuesday the ####? I know you don't know his stuff but his live show is great and I think you'd have fun. Free ticket and I would love the company :-)
I'd like to listen to some of his stuff b4 we go. What would u recommend?
His new album (just an EP) is called Peachtree Battle. I'd listen to that, plus an album called The Spade by butch walker and the black widows, plus Sycamore Meadows
Were u gonna work out at lunch? What time?
I was thinking about it. Just a short workout. I could do any time - interested?
Sure. Let me know what time works for u tomorrow. I'd say around 1 but I can usually be flexible.
